==== July 1, 2010 LoCo Team Meeting ====
'''Agenda'''
* Discuss LoCo Approval Process & Steps to Increase Success.
* Discuss Leadership Elections, since Re-election is in August.
'''Results'''
* <nowiki>[[http://www.novarata.net/mootbot/ubuntu-us-tn.20100701_1912.html|Mootbot Summary]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.novarata.net/mootbot/ubuntu-us-tn.log.20100701_1912.html|Mootbot Log]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://logs.ubuntu-eu.org/freenode/2010/07/02/%23ubuntu-us-tn.html|Channel Log]]</nowiki>
'''Summary'''
* Discussed requirements for Ubuntu Membership
 (wrst and elijah-mpb stated intentions of persuing)
* Discussed requirements for LoCo approval
* Touched on activites of the LoCo
    (jfenn2199's meeting at the end of July with Memphis' CIO, Website tutorials, assisting of users with problems)
* Decision to increase past activities and incorporate new ones such as an Ubuntu Hour
* Vote concluded that members present feel LoCo is ready to approach the council for approval
* After discussion of review of term limits for PoCs and Trustee, it was decided to postpone  debate to next meeting (August 5th 2010)
* wrst and cyberanger were nominated for Trustee with w4ett up for re-election
* netritous and jfenn2199 nominated for West TN PoC with ericG up for re-election
* Xpistos nominated for middle TN PoC with pace_t_zulu up for re-election
* linuxman410 nominated for east TN PoC with cyberanger up for re-election

==== August 6, 2009 LoCo Team Meeting ====
'''Agenda'''
* Discuss Team Leader Qualification and Requirements
* Nominate, Discuss and Elect LoCo Team Leader for Point of Contact and Team Coordination Efforts.
* Note: w4ett as Team Trustee is serving as current Team Point of Contact. Please forward all concerns and items for inclusion on the monthly meeting agenda to his Launchpad address w4ett at comcast.net or  ubuntu.tennessee.team@gmail.com
* Those members interested in pursuing the Team Leadership position and voting on the Team Leader Agenda Item during the August 2009 IRC Meeting should review the outline here: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LoCoTeamLeader
* Suggestion: Interested members should prepare nomination pages on their personal wiki and/or  individuals nominating these members seeking Team Leadership should present the qualification pages to the team membership via the mailing list. (This will streamline the nomination and election process).
* Discuss and plan for regional and/or statewide release parties for Karmic Koala 9.10 this October.
* In keeping with the previously approved regional model for team administration, schedule informal team meet-and-greet meetings in the near future.
'''Results'''
* <nowiki>[[http://www.novarata.net/mootbot/ubuntu-us-tn.20090806_1901.html|MootBot Summary]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://www.novarata.net/mootbot/ubuntu-us-tn.log.20090806_1901.html|MootBot Log]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://logs.ubuntu-eu.org/freenode/2009/08/07/%23ubuntu-us-tn.html|Channel Log]]</nowiki>
'''Synopsis'''
After discussion and vote, it was decided to implement a regional point of contact Leadership Council as proposed. See: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1218787   A special election will be held on 08/20/2009 to select regional leadership. w4ett was elected to serve as the Team Trustee for a one year term.
